Sentencas: LaInO3, a promising ion conductor for a holistic solid oxide fuel cell, was synthesized by a solid-state reaction method.
Titulo: Lanthanum indium oxide from X-ray powder diffraction

Sentencas: The structure was refined by the Rietveld method using X-ray powder diffraction data.
Titulo: Lanthanum indium oxide from X-ray powder diffraction

Sentencas: The structure of LaInO3 is distorted by the in-phase and antiphase tilting of oxygen octahedra in the a(+)b(-)b(-) system of the InO6 polyhedra.
Titulo: Lanthanum indium oxide from X-ray powder diffraction

Sentencas: In the Pmna space group, the In atom lies on an inversion centre and the La atom and one of the O atoms lie on a mirror plane.
Titulo: Lanthanum indium oxide from X-ray powder diffraction
